simple.escp.dom

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.escp.dom.Line
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmptyLine, ListLine, TableLine, TextLine

    public abstract class Line
extends java.lang.Object
    DOM class to represent each line in Page.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Line

        public Line()

    • Method Detail

      • isDynamic

        public abstract boolean isDynamic()
        Defines wether this line is a dynamic line or not. A dynamic line is a line that will be expanded later when filling this line with data. For example, a table line is a dynamic line because number of lines for that table can't be defined in parsing step. It requires the actual value to define the actual number of lines.
        Returns:
        true if this is a dynamic line or false if otherwise.

      • setLineNumber

        public void setLineNumber(java.lang.Integer lineNumber)
        Set a line number for this line. See also getLineNumber().

        Implementations are not required to provide line number value.

        Parameters:
        lineNumber - the line number starting from 1.

      • getLineNumber

        public java.lang.Integer getLineNumber()
        Retrieve line number for this line.

        Implementations are not required to provide global line number value.

        Returns:
        line number starting from 1. The first line number is counted from header if it is exists. This method will return null if line number hasn't been set previously.

      • setGlobalLineNumber

        public void setGlobalLineNumber(java.lang.Integer globalLineNumber)
        Set a global line number for this line. The difference between global line number and setLineNumber(Integer) is global line number will never restart to 1 while setLineNumber(Integer) should restart to 1 when starting a new page.

        Implementations are not required to provide global line number value.

        Parameters:
        globalLineNumber - the global line number starting from 1.

      • getGlobalLineNumber

        public java.lang.Integer getGlobalLineNumber()
        Get a global line number for this line. Global line number will be incremented by 1 until end of report is reached.

        Implementations are not required to provide global line number value.

        Returns:
        line number starting from 1.
